title: Executioner Goes to the Academy (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Award-winning Work   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   S*ave Protagonist   Sword And Magic
author: Soramatsu Renji   空松蓮司
description:
Charles has killed more than 1,000 criminals.
After more than 1,000 murders, he acquired physical and mental abilities that were better than normal people.
Utilizing these skills while hiding his past, he slowly rises to the top of the academy.
Follow Charles journey as he becomes the very best at his school and tries to escape his dark past.>
